name: Aiffd2007
tagline: R versions of boxed examples for the Analysis and Interpretation of Freshwater Fisheries Data (2007)
body:
The following are R versions of the “boxed example analyses” in the [Analysis and Interpretation of Freshwater Fisheries Data book](https://fisheries.org/shop/55049c) ([Guy](http://www.mtcfru.org/chris-guy/) and [Brown](https://www.sdstate.edu/index/directory/directory-detail.cfm?view=detail&ci=284), 2007).  Not all chapters, nor all boxes within each chapter, have been completed.

The documents were recently converted to RMarkdown and some code was updated.  It is unlikely that the conversion was perfect, so let me know if you find omissions or errors.

* Preliminaries
  * PDF / HTML / Script

3. Sampling and Experimental Design
  * [PDF](https://github.com/droglenc/aiffd2007/raw/master/Chapter3.pdf) / [HTML](https://github.com/droglenc/aiffd2007/blob/master/Chapter3.html) / [Script](https://github.com/droglenc/aiffd2007/blob/master/Chapter3.R)
4. Recruitment
  * PDF / HTML / Script
5. Age and Growth
  * PDF / HTML / Script
6. Mortality
  * PDF / HTML / Script
7. Relative Abundance and Catch per Unit Effort
  * PDF / HTML / Script
8. Abundance, Biomass, and Production
  * PDF / HTML / Script
9. Size Structure
  * PDF / HTML / Script
10. Condition
  * PDF / HTML / Script
11. Assessment of Diets and Feeding Patterns
  * PDF / HTML / Script
12. Bioenergetics
  * PDF / HTML / Script
13. Fish Population Bioassessment
  * PDF / HTML / Script
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
